title: ISic000760. I.Sicily inscription 000760
body:
Facsimile Images

1DIISMANIBUS[......?]PERSONALNAME
2AMICAECARISSI[................]
3NIMENTUMFE[..---]
4QUAEAPLURIBUS[.................]
5[..]REXEISUNUSB[.........---]
[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text from Manganaro 1989 (187 no.73 fig.78)

English translation

(Sacred?) to the gods of the underworld. I,..., made this tomb and monument for my dearest friend..., who was not succeeded by any heirs, from among them one was worthy...

commentary

bibliography

  • 1989.0344c https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283

  • Manganaro 1989 187 no.73 fig.78 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
